### [Constants](/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponentsFormatter/Options#Constants)

[`enum Style`](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/style-swift.enum)[Attributed String Key](/documentation/foundation/attributed-string-key)This constant is used as a key for person name component attributes in attributed strings returned by the [`annotatedString(from:)`](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/annotatedstring(from:)) method[Attributed String Components](/documentation/foundation/attributed-string-components)These constants are used to identify individual components of attributed strings returned by the [`annotatedString(from:)`](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/annotatedstring(from:)) method.[Component Delimiter](/documentation/foundation/component-delimiter)This constant defines the delimiter used to separate name components.
